name: quicktree2bsml
description: Convert output from quicktree to BSML.

options.description: Input multiple sequence alignment file, used as quicktree input. Alternatively, this may be the distance matrix used as input. If the input is a MSA file, the alignment is stored in the bsml. If only given a distance matrix, we can at the moment only store the sequence ids, with no seq-data-import and no alignment info.
Quicktree output in Newick (New Hampshire) format.
The full path to the BSML file that will be created.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
